pageProduct.name: Oral B Toothpaste 3D White Teeth Whitening Therapy Enamel Care 95g
pageProduct.description:
Information

Oral-B 3D White Whitening Therapy goes beyond whitening, it's therapy for your teeth.

The Active Mineral Complex helps to gently whiten by removing up to 95% of surface stains in 3 days.

Oral-B 3D White Whitening Therapy is proven enamel safe.

The fluoride formula helps to remineralise weakened enamel.

General Information

Oral-B 3D White Whitening Therapy Enamel Care Toothpaste removes up to 95% of stains in 3 days. Proven enamel safe.

The 3D White Therapy Collection is formulated with an Active Mineral Complex. The Enamel Care formula works to remineralise enamel and gently lifts up to 95% of surface stains to beautifully whiten teeth in 3 days.

Size: 95g

KEY FEATURES

• Gently lifts up to 95% of surface stains to beautifully whiten teeth in 3 days.
• Proven enamel safe
• The 3D White Therapy Collection is formulated with an Active Mineral Complex

Warnings

Do not swallow. Do not use this product in children 6 years of age or less. In case of intake of fluoride from other sources. consult a dentist or doctor.

Ingredients

Glycerin, Hydrated Silica, Sodium Hexametaphosphate, Water, PEG-6, Flavour, Trisodium Phosphate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Saccharin, Carrageenan, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Fluoride, Xanthan Gum, Sucralose, CI 77891, CI 77019

Contains: Sodium Flouride.

Directions

Apply the product onto a soft bristled toothbrush. Brush teeth thoroughly at least twice a day (morning and evening) or as recommended by a dentist.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
